text: Robert Navarro Muñoz (born 12 April 2002) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Real Sociedad B. ==Professional career== Navarro was born in Barcelona; his father Roberto Navarro was also a professional footballer who played in the city for over a decade (with third-tier CE L'Hospitalet and UE Sant Andreu).Roberto Navarro Juárez, BDFutbol With the family having relocated to Roberto's hometown of Pamplona, Robert started playing football with his local side CA Osasuna before joining FC Barcelona at age 11, living with his maternal grandparents. On 3 July 2018, Navarro signed with AS Monaco FC. Navarro made his senior debut for the club in a 1–0 Coupe de France win over Canet Roussillon FC on 6 January 2019, and at 16 years and 8 months was their youngest ever senior debutant. On 2 September 2019, Navarro signed a professional contract with Real Sociedad for three years. ==References== ==External links== * * La Preferente Profile * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Barcelona Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spain youth international footballers Category:Catalan footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Real Sociedad B footballers Category:AS Monaco FC players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Monaco Category:Spanish expatriates in Monaco
title: Robert Navarro (footballer)
